spec_data.Name: perl-Module-Load-Conditional
spec_data.Description:
This module provides simple ways to query and possibly load any of the modules
you have installed on your system during run-time.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:28:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Looking up module information and loading at run-time
